atk-abh03a10:2_2: Tattha dve brahmacariyavāsā, maggabhāvanā ca pabbajjā ca.
atk-abh03a10:2_5: Tattha ye paranimmitavasavattideve upādāya taduparidevesu maggabhāvanampi na icchanti seyyathāpi sammitiyā, te sandhāya natthi devesūti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_6: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṁse.
atk-abh03a10:2_8: Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti idaṁ suttaṁ nissāya dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti uppannaladdhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_9: Puna dvinnampi brahmacariyānaṁ antarāyikadhammavaseneva sabbe devā jaḷāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_10: Tattha hatthasaṁvācikāti mūgā viya hatthamuddhāya vattāro.
atk-abh03a10:2_11: Parato atthi devesūti pucchā paravādissa, maggabhāvanaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_12: Paṭiññāya adhippāyaṁ asallakkhetvā pabbajjāvasena anuyogo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:3_0: 270.Yattha natthi pabbajjāti pañhe gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devānaṁ maggapaṭilābhaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a10:3_1: Puna puṭṭho paccantavāsino ceva asaññasatte ca sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a10:3_3: Puna “atthi devesū”ti pañhepi maggabhāvanaṁ sandhāyeva paṭiññā sakavādissa, “sabbadevesū”ti vutte asaññasatte sandhāya paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a10:5_0: Atthi yattha atthīti atthi te devā, atthi vā so padeso, yattha atthīti evaṁ sattapadesavibhāgamukhena vissajjanaṁ sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:6_1: Suttānuyoge kuhiṁ phaluppattīti tassa anāgāmino arahattaphaluppatti kuhinti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:7_2: yasmā anāgāmipuggalo idha loke bhāvitena maggena tattha suddhāvāsesu phalaṁ sacchikaroti, na tattha aññaṁ maggaṁ bhāveti, tasmā natthi devesu brahmacariyavāsoti.
atk-abh03a10:9_1: Idāni yadi aññattha bhāvitena maggena aññattha phalasacchikiriyā hoti, sotāpannādīnampi siyāti etamatthaṁ dassetuṁ puna anāgāmītiādīnaṁ saṁsandanapucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:9_2: Tattha anāgāmissa phalasacchikiriyāya paṭiññā, sesānaṁ phalasacchikiriyāya paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:9_3: Idha bhāvitamaggo hi anāgāmī idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a10:9_4: So idha anāgāmimaggaṁ bhāvetvā “opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī”ti vacanato “puna maggabhāvanaṁ vinā upapattivaseneva arahattaphalaṁ sacchikarotī”ti tassa laddhi.
atk-abh03a10:9_5: Sotāpannasakadāgāmino pana tattha maggaṁ bhāvetvā tatrupapattikā nāma hontīti tesaṁ idhāgamanaññeva natthi.
atk-abh03a10:9_6: Iti so anāgāmissa phalasacchikiriyaṁ puṭṭho paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a10:10_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggenāti pañhe “anāgāmino tattha maggabhāvanāva natthī”ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:10_1: Maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti pucchā sakavādissa, rūpāvacaramaggaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a10:10_2: Rūpāvacaramaggena hi so idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma jāto.
atk-abh03a10:11_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyoti pañhe “opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī”ti vacanato upapattiyāvassa katakaraṇīyādibhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a10:11_1: Arahāti pañhe idhaparinibbāyino arahato vaseneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:12_0: Atthi arahato punabbhavotiādīsupi tatthaparinibbāyī idhaparinibbāyīnaṁ vaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a10:12_1: Appaṭividdhākuppova tatthaparinibbāyatīti puṭṭho idheva bhāvitena maggena tassa akuppapaṭivedhaṁ icchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:13_0: Yathā migoti paṭhamaṁ udāharaṇaṁ paravādissa, dutiyaṁ sakavādissa. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a10:16_2: Tattha ye sotāpannādīnaṁ nānābhisamayavasena dukkhadassanādīhi odhiso odhiso ekadesena ekadesena kilesappahānaṁ icchanti seyyathāpi etarahi sammitiyādayo, tesaṁ taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ odhisoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:16_3: Puna anuyogo sakavādissa, ekadesena sotāpannādibhāvassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
